text: Platydesma remyi, the Hawai'i pilo kea, is a species of plant in the family Rutaceae. It is endemic to the island of Hawaii. It is threatened by habitat loss. Platydesma remyi is on the IUCN Red List of Endangered species. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Platydesma remyi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
